meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>invade</kanji> and the verb vocab version means <vocabulary>to invade</vocabulary> as well!
readingMnemonic: I'm going <vocabulary>to invade</vocabulary> your country, <reading>oka</reading>y (おか)? Sorry about that, but everything will be <reading>oka</reading>y when I'm done.
